title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-2.4 - Condition for allowance for apartment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-2.4 - Condition for allowance for apartment

State Regulations

No allowance will be permitted for an apartment furnished
by an employer to an employee unless the employer makes available to the

Commissioner of Labor, or his representative, the rental records prescribed in
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-2.4

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
